StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetWFVContactCardRows]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgId uniqueiden..er = null, @RecruiterId uniqueiden..er = null, @ScheduledEventsStart date.me, @ScheduledEventsEnd date.me, @EventTypeId int = null, @OnlyNextScheduledEvent bit = 1 )
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @Organiza.onID INT
SELECT @Organiza.onID = ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE rowguid = @orgid
SELECT rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, rp.rowguid, rp.RANK_CODE, rcrtr.LAST_NAME, rcrtr.FIRST_NAME, rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME INTO #Recrui.ngPerson FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] rcrtr ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = rcrtr.PERSON_ID WHERE ((rp.RowGuid = @RecruiterId AND @RecruiterId IS NOT NULL) OR (@RecruiterId IS NULL))
SELECT msz.SectorID, msz.Zip INTO #MapsSectorZip FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip msz WHERE msz.LastUpdateDate IN (SELECT MAX(msz2.LastUpdateDate) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip msz2 WHERE msz.Zip = msz2.Zip)
SELECT DISTINCT ms.SectorID, ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId INTO #MapsSector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms INNER JOIN #MapsSectorZip msz ON msz.SectorID = ms.SectorID WHERE ms.LastUpdateDate IN (SELECT MAX(ms2.LastUpdateDate) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms2 WHERE ms.SectorID = ms2.SectorID)
SELECT ro.rowguid INTO #Recrui.ngOrganiza.on FROM #MapsSector ms INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = ro.rowguid WHERE @Organiza.onId = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID OR @Organiza.onId IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT msr.Recrui.ngPersonId, msr.SectorID INTO #MapsSectorRecruiter FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter msr INNER JOIN #MapsSectorZip msz ON msz.SectorID = msr.SectorID AND msr.LastUpdateDate IN ( SELECT TOP 1 MAX(msr2.LastUpdateDate) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter msr2 WHERE msr.SectorID = msr2.SectorID) SELECT cc.ID, cc.DatePrepared, cc.LastName, cc.FirstName, msz.SectorID INTO #TempContactCard FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].ContactCard cc INNER JOIN #MapsSectorZip msz ON SUBSTRING(cc.Work_ZipCode,1,5) = msz.Zip
SELECT e.StartDate AS NextEvent INTO #NextEvent FROM #TempContactCard cc INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es ON es.SubjectID = cc.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].Event e ON e.id = es.even.d WHERE e.StartDate >= GetDate()
SELECT es.SubjectID, e.ID AS EventID, e.StartDate, e.EventTypeId, e.EventTypeOther, et.[Type] as EventType INTO #ContactCardEvent FROM #TempContactCard cc INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es ON es.SubjectId = cc.ID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.Event e ON e.id = es.even.d AND (e.StartDate IN (SELECT NextEvent FROM #NextEvent) OR (@OnlyNextScheduledEvent = 0 AND e.StartDate >= GetDate()) -- this returns all future events when set to 0 ) inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] et on et.ID = e.EventTypeId
SELECT cc.ID, cc.DatePrepared, cc.LastName, cc.FirstName, cc.SectorID, msr.Recrui.ngPersonId INTO #ContactCard FROM #TempContactCard cc INNER JOIN #MapsSector ms ON cc.SectorID = ms.SectorID INNER JOIN #Recrui.ngOrganiza.on ro ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = ro.rowguid INNER JOIN #MapsSectorRecruiter msr ON cc.SectorID = msr.SectorID
SELECT dis.nct cc.ID AS ApplicantAssetID ,cc.ID AS CardID ,cc.DatePrepared AS CreateDate ,COALESCE(RTRIM(cc.LastName), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(cc.FirstName), SPACE(0)) AS ApplicantAssetName ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Recruiter ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterShortName ,rp.[rowguid] AS RecruiterID ,cce.EventID AS EventID ,cce.StartDate AS EventDate ,cce.EventTypeOther ,cce.EventType FROM #ContactCard cc INNER JOIN #Recrui.ngPerson rp ON cc.Recrui.ngPersonID = rp.rowguid INNER JOIN #ContactCardEvent cce ON cce.SubjectID = cc.ID WHERE cce.StartDate >= @ScheduledEventsStart AND cce.StartDate < @ScheduledEventsEnd AND (cce.EventTypeId = @EventTypeId OR @EventTypeId IS NULL)
DROP TABLE #MapsSector DROP TABLE #MapsSectorZip DROP TABLE #MapsSectorRecruiter DROP TABLE #Recrui.ngOrganiza.on DROP TABLE #Recrui.ngPerson DROP TABLE #TempContactCard DROP TABLE #NextEvent DROP TABLE #ContactCardEvent DROP TABLE #ContactCard
